name: BestOffice | 4-Tier Wire Storage Shelves | 36x14x54 | Black | with Adjustable Racks | Heavy-Duty Metal Shelf, Holds Upto 1000 lbs | No-Tool Assembly | Ideal for Home & Garage Shelving
short_description: Steel
ADJUSTABLE METAL SHELVING: Each tier on this wire shelving unit adjusts in 1-inch increments, letting you customize your shelf's layout for a book shelf, garage storage or closet storage needs.
HEAVY-DUTY & FLEXIBLE SETUP: Use feet levelers for up to 1000 lbs total (250 lbs per shelf) or caster wheels for easy mobility, supporting up to 220 lbs when weight is evenly distributed.
VERTICAL STORAGE SOLUTION: The slim metal shelving unit offers tiered space-efficient storage while minimizing floor footprint, ideal for creating extra room in tight or limited storage areas.
RUST-RESISTANT WIRE SHELF: Powder-coated finish prevents the shelf from rust and corrosion, ensuring durable storage and organization whether placed as closet shelves or garage storage shelves.
EASY TOOL-FREE SETUP: This storage shelf is assembled in minutes. No tools are required. Offering a fast, stable solution for shelving in home offices, laundry rooms, or garage organization.
product_description: The BestOffice Wire Shelf offers a practical, durable, and stylish solution for organizing your home or workspace. Crafted from high-quality steel and finished with a rust-resistant coating, this shelving unit ensures long-lasting use in a variety of environments including kitchens, garages, offices, pantries, laundry rooms, and more. The open wire design enhances ventilation and reduces dust accumulation, keeping your items dry, clean, and easy to locate. Its sleek finish complements a wide range of interiors while adding a modern industrial touch. Assembly is quick and hassle-free. No tools are required. Each shelf level is height adjustable, giving you the flexibility to store and display a range of items such as appliances, tools, books, and pantry goods. The reinforced V-shaped wire mesh offers enhanced support and stability, while the adjustable leveling feet ensure the unit stays steady even on uneven surfaces. Whether you need extra storage in compact areas or want to maximize vertical space, this wire shelf brings smart organization and dependable performance to any room. Available in multiple sizes and two sleek finishes black and chrome to suit your space and style.

product_description: Add additional storage to a closet, craft room, laundry room, garage, and more with the ClosetMaid Ventilated Wire Shelf Kit. Durably made with metal wire in a white vinyl coating for added durability, this shelf kit has a ventilated design to keep clothing or linens fresh and a heavy-duty storage capacity for ample storage. This kit is easy to install with everything you need in 1 package and includes hardware and instructions. It seamlessly coordinates with other ClosetMaid accessories to conveniently maximize your storage options. This multipurpose shelf installs anywhere you need extra storage. ClosetMaid shelving is coated with a proprietary durable vinyl coating that resists rusting, discoloration, fading, and chipping ClosetMaid wire shelving is also SCS Certified for a minimum of 91% recycled content and is Gold Indoor Air Quality Certified. Choose from 4 foot or 3-foot-wide size options to easily fit into your space.

name: Storage Shelves Organizer - 5 Tier Metal Shelf Organizer with Metal Wheels and Adjustable Leveling Feet, Heavy Duty Garage Shelving for Kitchen, Pantry and Closet, 33.1"x12.6"x73.5", Black
short_description: 2 ASSEMBLY OPTIONS: This versatile 5-tier wire shelving unit comes with both 360° rotatable metal wheels and adjustable leveling feet, offering the flexibility to choose between a mobile organization or fixed storage setup. Easily switch between stationary placement for long-term use and rolling mobility for convenient repositioning around your home, garage, or workspace.

ULTRA-STABLE METAL SHELVES: The Sakugi heavy-duty shelving unit and storage solution features reinforced construction with thick metal tubes, side bars, and a wall-fixing kit for added safety. This sturdy shelf can hold up to 1,000 lbs when using leveling feet or 150 lbs when on metal wheels, making it ideal for tools, bins, kitchen appliances, or laundry supplies.

PREMIUM METAL MATERIAL: Made from high-quality metal with a smooth, robust finish, this storage shelf is rustproof, moisture-resistant, and scratch-resistant, ensuring long-lasting durability against everyday use. The mesh shelves are effortless to wipe clean, making it an ideal choice for humid spaces such as kitchens, bathrooms, laundry rooms, or basements.

QUICK, HASSLE-FREE INSTALLATION: Get set up in no time! With clear instructions, all hardware included, and a simple snap-connected design, this display shelf requires no extra professional tools or skills. Whether you're a DIYer or a beginner, you'll have your 5-tier rack shelf ready in minutes for immediate use.

MULTIPURPOSE STORAGE ANYWHERE: Stylish and practical, this metal shelving unit blends seamlessly into any space. Use it as garage storage shelves, kitchen shelves, pantry shelves, or laundry room shelves to organize tools, pantry items, cleaning supplies, books, and more. Its compact footprint and tall 5-tier design maximize space without crowding your room.
